name: No More Bosses
description:
Entry For Game Jam 113 Final Boss
Game by: Asmondia 
Music by:  Twitchywhalez

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys movement
  • Q - Use Item
  • E-R Cycle through items
  • Shift - Slow Walk
  • P - Pause

There are no more bosses left to defeat, that was the last one. Guess there is always retirement...
